bitpit::utils::DoubleFloatingEqual Struct Reference

#include <commonUtils.hpp>

Public Member Functions

bool operator() (const double &x, const double &y, double errorFactor=1.0) const
 

Detailed Description

Functor to compare two double precision floating point numbers.

See: https://randomascii.wordpress.com/2012/02/25/comparing-floating-point-numbers-2012-edition/

Definition at line 94 of file commonUtils.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

◆ operator()()

bool bitpit::utils::DoubleFloatingEqual::operator() ( const double &  x,
const double &  y,
double  errorFactor = 1.0 
) const
inline

Compares the specified double precision floating point numbers and returns true if the numbers match.

Parameters
xif the first value to compare
yif the second value to compare
errorFactoris a factor proportional to the floating point errors creeping in as a result of x and y computation
Returns
Returns true if the numbers match, false otherwise.
